mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.cart_quantity, c.id, c.product_code ,t.name,t.tel,t.email,t.address1,t.address2,t.address3,t.zip , c.option1, c.option2, c.add_price, o.accumulation, o.inventory,p.product_name,p.thumb_img,p.price, p.shipping_cost, s.seller_code,s.seller_name,s.basic_shipping_cost,s.free_shipping_cost from cart c join customer t on c.id = t.id join options o on o.product_code = c.product_code join product_list p on c.product_code = p.product_code join seller s on p.seller_code= s.seller_code where c.id=#{id} and cart_no=#{cart_no} and c.option1=o.option1 order by s.seller_code desc;

select o.order_code,p.product_code,product_name,thumb_img,price,quantity,delivery_state,tracking_no,p.shipping_cost,l.add_price from order_list l left join ordered o on l.order_code = o.order_code left join product_list p on l.product_code = p.product_code where id=#{id} order by l.order_no desc

select distinct p.shipping_cost,s.seller_name,s.seller_code from cart c join customer t on c.id = t.id join options o on o.product_code = c.product_code join product_list p on p.product_code= o.product_code join seller s on s.seller_code = p.seller_code
where c.id= #{id} and s.seller_code= #{seller_code}
and c.option1=o.option1
order by s.seller_name
